Self-Study

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#44393d” header_2_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_2_font_size=”38px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Online courses

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#434552″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”||1.6%||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Over the years, I’ve offered a large number of live, interactive online courses – from recordings of single-session workshops in The Bone Cave to longer, weeks-long or yearlong courses. Those courses are now available for purchase as self-study options. Course content can include recordings of lectures and webinars, teaching booklets, audio journeys and a variety of other resource materials, all of which are downloadable for your ongoing use. Please click on the individual course links for a full description of what is included. Please also check out the academic and professional background which qualifies me to run these courses here.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” module_id=”onlinecourses” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ background_color=”#434552″ custom_padding=”13px||80px|||” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.0″ header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”38px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

NEW: FINDING OURSELVES IN FAIRY TALES

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Scan-Bauer-Golden-key-LR.jpg” title_text=”Scan Bauer Golden key LR” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ custom_margin=”||57px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Fairy tales help us to reimagine ourselves, because at the heart of them is transformation. Explore the myriad ways in which we can find ourselves in these beautiful old stories.

In this course, you’ll explore the Fairy-tale Heroine’s Journey; working with images and narrative elements in fairy tales; reimagining fairy tales for the times and writing your own; writing your life as a fairy tale; creating your own inner imaginarium – and much more.

3 sessions, £50.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/finding-ourselves-in-fairy-tales/” button_text=”FIND OUT MORE” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” module_id=”onlinecourses” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#434552″ custom_padding=”13px||80px|||” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”38px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

COURTING THE WORLD SOUL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Courting the World Soul is an on-demand, self-study foundation course in cultivating the mythic imagination.

– learn practical techniques to create a grounded, embodied practice 

– uncover the mythic themes and archetypes which are active in your life

– understand your own individual mythopoetic journey through this life, and the unique gift you bring to this world, at this time

Find out more

AVAILABLE NOW

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”10px|40px|0px|40px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THIS MYTHIC LIFE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.5em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|40px” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our old Western traditions tell us that it’s through exercising the embodied and emplaced imagination – through working with myth, archetypes, dreams, fairy tales, and through exploring creative and expressive practices – that we can come to understand our unique gift and purpose, and weave ourselves back into the web of life on this beautiful, animate Earth.

This Mythic Life, then, is a unique on-demand, self-study course which guides you to revive these old enchantments, and unlock the magic of the everyday.

FIND OUT MORE

CELTIC STUDIES

SESSIONS FROM THE BONE CAVE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#D9C2A3″ text_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To purchase a bundle of the eleven individual Bone Cave gatherings below for just £150, please visit this page.

BRIGID AND THE RETURN OF THE LIGHT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/brigid-and-the-return-of-the-light/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

In this workshop we explore the mythology of the old Celtic goddess and early Christian saint, Brigid. We uncover her association with the perpetual fire, and her relationship to the archetypes of the Smith, the Poet, and the Green Woman. What inspiration can she offer us? £25.

Find out more

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Christopher-Williams-Branwen.png” title_text=”Christopher Williams Branwen” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/women-of-the-mabinogion/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/women-of-the-mabinogion/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WOMEN OF THE MABINOGION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Work with the magical, mythical stories of Rhiannon, Branwen, Blodeuwedd and Arianrhod to discover what these vividly drawn Otherworldly women can offer us today. £25

FIND OUT MORE

WOMEN OF THE ISLANDS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why do ancient British and Irish stories of priestesses, keepers of women’s mysteries, who inhabit islands – places where women can be free, safe, apart from the patriarchy – resonate so strongly with us today? £25.

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Sanct-Grael.png” title_text=”Sanct Grael” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-mystery-of-the-grail/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-mystery-of-the-grail/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE MYSTERY OF THE GRAIL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What do the myths and legends of the Grail – and the magical women within them – tell us of what our ancestors believed about the meaning of life, and the underlying order of the cosmos? £25.

Find out more

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_id=”onlinecourses” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#434552″ custom_padding=”13px||80px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Workshops” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ width=”85%” max_width=”100%” use_custom_width=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Psyche-square.jpg” title_text=”Psyche square” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/psyche-the-size-of-earth/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/psyche-the-size-of-earth/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A PSYCHE THE SIZE OF EARTH

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The roots of our ancient traditions are anchored in the land, and it is our greatest teacher. In this workshop, we work with the ways we can court and embed ourselves in the psyche of this beautiful, animate earth. £25.

Find out more

THE CAVE OF DREAMS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Explore stories and archetypes which illustrate the transformative potential of time spent in the cave. We delve into the oracular, and meet the Wise Old Woman who teaches us how to dream and shows us the way back into the light. £25

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Circe-square.png” title_text=”Circe square” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-reclaiming-the-dark-feminine/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-reclaiming-the-dark-feminine/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

RECLAIMING THE DARK FEMININE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How do we unlock the closet door and embrace the wild, wrathful and cthonic in our nature? We work with the stories of Lilith, Hel, Hecate and the Morrígan to explore the transformative power of the dark feminine. £25.

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Dante_Gabriel_Rossetti_-_Beata_Beatrix-square.jpg” title_text=”Dante Gabriel Rossetti: Beata Beatrix, ca 1864-70.” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-the-holy-longing/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-the-holy-longing/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE HOLY LONGING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Discover the unique calling, personal gift and individual image which each of us carries, and which illuminate and serve the world. We also explore the mythology of Sophia, the personification of Wisdom and of the anima mundi. £25.

Find out more

PSYCHE AND EROS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/psyche-and-eros/” sticky_enabled=”0″]

In this gathering, we dived deeply into the rich old myth of Psyche and Eros, walking alongside Psyche as she was tested , dancing with death and navigating the interplay between the archetypal masculine and feminine. How can this story inform and illuminate our own journey to wholeness? What does wholeness actually mean?  £25

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Descent-square.jpg” title_text=”Descent-square” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/descent/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-cave-of-dreams/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DESCENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|18px|40px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What kind of soul journey is required of us at a time when the world around us – social, political, environmental – is in crisis? What happens to us when we ‘fall out of myth’?This gathering was anchored around a visioning of Persephone’s cyclical descent to the Underworld and reemergence into the light. 

£30

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/RWsquare.jpg” title_text=”OLYMPUS DIGITAL CAMERA” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-reclaiming-the-dark-feminine/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#515151″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-reclaiming-the-dark-feminine/” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE ROOTED WOMAN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This gathering in The Bone Cave was the first time that Sharon had taught on the ideas in her bestselling 2016 book, If Women Rose Rooted. The publication of The Rooted Woman Oracle in January 2024 offered an opportunity to deepen the images and extend the ideas in the book. £25.

FIND OUT MORE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|||” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Beata-Beatrix-square.jpg” title_text=”Beata Beatrix square” url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-the-holy-longing/” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ custom_margin=”||0px|” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”15px|18px|0px|18px|false|true” animation_style=”fade” link_option_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-bone-cave-the-holy-longing/” disabled=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE HOLY LONGING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#282723″ text_font_size=”18px” link_font=”|600||on|||||” link_text_color=”#fdb467″ link_font_size=”16px” link_letter_spacing=”3px” link_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#893e39″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”0px|40px|40px|18px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” disabled=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Do you have an urgent calling, a personal gift, a unique image which you carry inside to illuminate this world at this challenging time? We explore the mythology of Sophia, the personification of Wisdom and the anima mundi.

£25.

Find out more

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Self-StudyOnline coursesOver the years, I’ve offered a large number of live, interactive online courses – from recordings of single-session workshops in The Bone Cave to longer, weeks-long or yearlong courses. Those courses are now available for purchase as self-study options. Course content can include recordings of lectures and webinars, teaching booklets, audio journeys and a […]
